org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.facilities

Interface PropertyChangeValidator


  • public interface PropertyChangeValidator
    Properties are validated before being applied.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AsyncRequest<java.lang.String> validatePropertyChangeAReq(java.lang.String _propertyName, java.lang.Object _oldValue, java.lang.Object _newValue)
      The request returns a null if the property is valid, otherwise it returns an error message.

    • Method Detail

      • validatePropertyChangeAReq

        AsyncRequest<java.lang.String> validatePropertyChangeAReq(java.lang.String _propertyName,
                                                        java.lang.Object _oldValue,
                                                        java.lang.Object _newValue)
        The request returns a null if the property is valid, otherwise it returns an error message.
        Parameters:
        _propertyName - The name of the property.
        _oldValue - The old value.
        _newValue - The proposed new value.
        Returns:
        Error message or null.
